content: Have a good weekend, everyone! :heart: :tada: :rocket:
@Philip Durbin wants us to have so some chitter chatter here! So basically he's asking for SPAM instead of HAM. What are you having for Christmas 2024? :yum:
Wow, you really are from the future. Time to walk doggo! Oh! When I get a moment I'll upload a custom emoji for him.
Testing the iPhone Zulip app. Seems very intuitive. Easy to go to different streams and conversations from different directions, and you can upload files and photos easily.
Glad to hear it! Oh speaking of doggo, this morning at standup @Don Sizemore said he hadn't seen him in a while. So I showed a video of him rolling around. :dog:
@Deirdre Kirmis oh, I meant to tell you... in Zulip you can move messages from one topic to another. I moved your introduction. I hope you don't mind! :happy:
midnight.jpg
No worries at all! Iâ€™m a little confused about which topic Iâ€™m posting in anyway, but Iâ€™ll get it! ğŸ˜„ Doggo is a cutie! ğŸ¶
ah i see now how it works!
Wuff wuff!
Or is he more of a "Wau wau" type? :dog:
I'd say his most common vocalization is "snuff!"
But that said, he is half terrier, so he's a yippie dog at heart, unfortunately.

Philip Durbin said:

But that said, he is half terrier, so he's a yippie dog at heart, unfortunately.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Youth_International_Party
Heh. I actually googled "yippie" to see if was spelling it right. "Yappy" was suggested but I prefer "yippie".
Happy St. Patrick's Day and have a good weekend! :shamrock:
Off to LibrePlanet! Once upon a time I gave a lightning talk about Dataverse there.
In the report from day 1 there's pic of me. :sweat_smile:
Have a good weekend, everyone!
I leave you with a fun tool to play with over the weekend: https://github.com/jupyterlite/jupyterlite ... might make a very nice dataset-level external tool! See you Monday!
Five people online in Zulip this morning! Fun! :happy:
Have a good weekend! Happy Mother's Day!
I'm on my way to the airport! To Portugal!
Enjoy the community meeting! :)
Thanks! It's been great!
I'm back! :-)
Thank goodness!
It didn't look like you folks needed me :smiley:
Ha! I wouldn't say that. I'd say we are surviving. And the questions are queuing up. :sweat_smile:
It's nice to end the week by making a pull request at quittin' time! :big_smile: Have a good weekend!
Have a good weekend! :wave:
Y'all, I'm in Jena - hometown of Schiller - for the deRSE23 Unconf. I'm gonna hit the road now, meet folks. If anyone here is town, let me know!
Looks pretty good, but it's a little bit out of my ways unfortunately : ) Hope you had a good time though!
Busting out the emergency rain gear to bike home! :bike: Have a good weekend!
Have a good weekend! It's a holiday in the US on Monday (Columbus Day Indigenous Peoples' Day). See you Tuesday!
Issue #10000 has been opened. https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10000
As a prize, you get to fix it. :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
Have a good weekend, everyone! Thanks for visiting, @Dimitri Szabo !
Like to add here to see it's pretty cool Zulip seems to be heating up.
Absolutely. Love it.
Phew! Busy day! See you tomorrow!

I'm heading out soon. Have a good weekend, everyone. On Sunday, my daughter is rowing in the Head of the Charles! "It is the largest 3-day regatta in the world, with 11,000 athletes rowing in over 1,900 boats in 61 events." -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Head_of_the_Charles_Regatta :rowboat:

Thomas van Erven said:

Like to add here to see it's pretty cool Zulip seems to be heating up.

The count of total users is definitely up! From https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/stats

Screenshot-2023-10-27-at-2.20.48-PM.png

Also from the department of good news...

Dataverse is now in 35 countries! https://iqss.github.io/dataverse-installations/bycountry.html

Welcome to https://science-data.hu in Hungary! :flag_hungary:

/cc @PÃ©ter Pallinger

Screenshot-2023-10-27-at-4.21.45-PM.png
Have a good weekend!
This cracked me up: https://mstdn.social/@stux/111359789584415430
Have a good weekend! :wave:
Thinking about how to convert "feels like 19F (-7C)" into a good vibe. :cold_face:
I guess I'll say I'm glad is happy, healthy, and ready for a walk.
Have a good weekend, everyone! Happy December! :snowflake: :snowman:
Almost time for our holiday party! :partying_face:
Have a good weekend! Much warmer here, thankfully!
Have a great weekend Phil!
Happy New Year! :tada: I hope everyone had a nice break!
Have a good weekend, everyone!
Have a good weekend! As I mentioned over in #community > holidays etc. , Monday is a holiday in the US. See you Tuesday!
Have a good weekend, y'all!
I'm off for a ski trip! :skier: Have a good weekend, all! See you when I'm back on Thursday!
Have a great time!

Thanks, we did! Here are a couple pics:

ski.jpg
snow.jpg
Have a good weekend, everyone!
Flying to Mexico on Sunday for #community > #Dataverse2024! Looking forward to seeing some of you there!
Mexico was awesome.
I'm heading out and I'm off Monday. See you Tuesday! Have a good weekend!

Have a good weekend! Take your dog to the beach, like we did last weekend!

beach-dog.jpg
He looks so happy!
Have a good weekend!
Finally arrived in Burlington, Vermont. Have a good weekend! See you Monday.
The cutest kid is outside my office and asked me to help him with his code. He's making a turtle go into a house. :house: :turtle:
So you are helping him to containerize his turtle, got it! :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
I suggested that he rename cloneC to house but he didn't like that.
I'm off tomorrow. Have a good weekend! See you Monday!

My kids wanted to listen to The Imperial March. Here's what Spotify showed me for the timeline:
image.png
On a related note: I'm off as of Friday and will be back in June...
You're marching somewhere? :grinning:
@Oliver Bertuch I am disappointed it is the imperial march and the lightsaber is not red :thinking:
It's time for me to get out of here. Have a good weekend, everyone! :wave:
Have a good weekend, all!
Where does the time go? A beautiful, sunny day in Boston! :sunny: Have a good weekend! :beach_umbrella:
I'm heading out. Have a good weekend!
I have tomorrow (Friday) off and my daughter graduates from high school on Sunday! Have a good weekend!
Second annual IQSS boat ride :ship:11a494f4-fa12-47e1-bf17-a67cb1bf676b.jpg
(Most of the) Dataverse team 1c12532e-22ad-47a4-817a-9f48a7679c38.jpg
Have a good weekend! :wave:
I'm heading out. I'm on vacation the next two weeks, bringing the kids to Ireland! :flag_ireland: :shamrock: See you on Monday, July 1st!
Welcome back @Philip Durbin ! Did you bring some Leprechauns back home?
Ha, nope but I posted some pics! http://thedurbins.com/phil/blog/2024/06/30/our-trip-to-ireland.html
Noice!
As you might be able to tell, my kids love animals :sheep: :goat: :pig: :horse: :cow: :dog: :cat:
<irony>Is that right?</irony> :innocent:
Seems like you folks had a great time :smiling_face:
Yeah, and it was nice and cool as you can tell from the hats and jackets. When we checked the weather back home it said "feels like 103F (39C)" :hot_face:
Yeah we had a little heat wave here as well, but nowhere near 39Â°!
Well, I'm talking about the "feels like", with humidity. I think the air temps were more like 96F (35.5C).
Still, we made it just to 30/31 :sweat_smile:
Yeah, this is why we're afraid to go to Germany or France or wherever for summer vacations. :disappointed:
Because it's too cold? :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing::innocent:
And to be fair: it's been for 2 days only
We might go to Paris in the Spring. We'll see. The older kid will be in London and would join.
As I mentioned in #community > holidays etc. folks at Harvard anyway are out tomorrow and Friday. Have a good weekend!
Happy 4th of July @Philip Durbin
Thanks! It was fun. We went to Vermont. Look at this happy dog:
And here it is the weekend again. Have a good one!
Have a good weekend, everyone! I'm off to go kayaking! :canoe:
I'm heading out. Have a nice weekend! Enjoy the Olympics if you're watching! :gold: :silver: :bronze:
I'm taking tomorrow off. See you Monday! Have a good weekend!
I'm out for a loooong weekend. My kids are going to ride roller coasters with their cousins and probably swim in a lake. :ocean: :roller_coaster: See you on Tuesday! :wave:
Heading out. Have a good weekend! :beach_umbrella:

My daughter is leaving for college! She's flying to California with 15 other kids. I'm taking tomorrow and Friday off to help her pack and get ready. :airplane:

Also, Monday is a holiday here (Labor Day). Have a good weekend!

Boarding for a whale watch! :humpback_whale:
20240905_093135.jpg

55dd257a-caec-43bf-87eb-fc28ef7ba0eb.png

Well! That was fun. We should look for whales every year. :grinning:

Have a good weekend, all! :humpback_whale: :beach_umbrella:
I'm sneaking out a bit early. Have a good weekend, all! :mountain: :santa:

Have a good weekend, all! :wave:
I'm taking tomorrow off and Monday is a holiday in the US. Have a nice weekend!
Have a nice weekend, all! :beach_umbrella:
Enjoy your weekend! :sunny:
Have a good weekend, everyone! :tada:
863e616c-99d0-4d3a-a325-36448ad1d853.jpg have good weekend from Costa Rica !
Awesome pic. I'm taking off pretty soon. Have a good weekend!

Very thankful for the Dataverse Community.

I'm off the whole week!!!!!

First snow! :snowflake:

footprints.jpg
Have a good weekend! :acrobatics:
Have a good weekend! My niece is flying in with her toddler (and husband but who cares). Should be fun.
Frohes Fest und Guten Rutsch! Happy Xmas and don't stumble while stepping into the next year! :christmas: :star:

Happy Holidays! I just posted something at #community > holidays etc. about how IQSS is closed until Jan 2. I'm taking a little extra time off as well, returning Tue, Jan 7 (just in time for the community call!). See you then!
have booked my flight tickets for the Community Meeting! Very excited! :wedding::mountain_sunrise: <-- my approximation of Chapel Hill!
Hooray! #community > #Dataverse2025 here we come!

Going skiing tomorrow! :skier: My daughter has the day off for Lunar New Year. :tada:
Have a good weekend! :beach_umbrella:
Heading out. Have a good weekend. I'm off to see Mean Girls the Musical at my kid's high school tomorrow night!
Next week is school vacation week. We're taking the kids skiing. :skier: I'll be back on Monday, Feb 24th. Have a nice weekend!
Have a good weekend!

Zulip announced a new general chat feature that I just enabled.

I think "general chat" could be a good place for saying "have a good weekend" or whatever. Previously I was putting messages like this in a topic called "good vibes", but I just moved those messages to "general chat".

Please give "general chat" a try!
Bah, @Oliver Bertuch and I have confirmed that it doesn't work from mobile.
I turned it off and moved these message back to "good vibes". Oh well. :shrug:
Have a good weekend, folks! :beach_umbrella:

Happy Pi Day! :pie:

cherry.jpg
Have a good weekend! :beach_umbrella:
Have a good weekend, everyone! :wave:
It's finally warming up in Boston! :sunny: Have a good weekend! :tada:
I'm on annual leave for the next two weeks. Have a lot of fun folks!
Sounds nice. Have a good weekend, all!
My daughter is studying in London and we're flying there to visit. :flag_united_kingdom: And take her to Paris. :flag_france: See you when I get back on Monday, April 28th!

Drinks and oysters with Amelie and Dimitri in Paris!

Have a good weekend all!
Have a good weekend! See you in June! :crazy:
I've been working on my talks for #community > #Dataverse2025! Hope to see you there! Have a good weekend!
Still working on one of it, hopefully making @Heath Sledge a bit happier over the weekend :smile:
I'm taking a looong weekend for a trip to Seattle. :mountain: See you on Monday!

40 C (104 F) with a "feels like" of 44 C (112 F) :hot_face:

Heading out fairly soon and I'm out on Monday. Have a good weekend! It cooled off here! :tada: :relieved:

Heading out pretty soon. As I mentioned in #community > holidays etc. it's a holiday tomorrow so I'll see you all on Monday! Have a good weekend!

IMG_20250710_221557.jpg
Enjoying summer nights after a period of hunting bugs for fun and profit, also for helping devs address security issues, it's still reserved but I achieved my first CVE in a another widely used GitHub repo.

Yes, congrats!

As for myself, I have the day off tomorrow since I'm driving to pick up my kid from a two week overnight art camp in western Massachusetts. She's been doing some neat stuff!

Have a good weekend, everyone! See you on Monday!

I got accepted in the Cyber security degree I wanted! Feeling so happy!

It finally cooled off a bit here! Have a good weekend!
I'm out on Friday and Monday. Taking my French-studying kids to Montreal! :baguette:

Montreal was so much fun. Quite a party town! Concerts until 11pm even on Sunday nights. :tada: And my kids loved the oldest cat cafe in North America

This is a short week for me. Off to move my daughter to her college dorm and then a family visit. Monday is a holiday. See you Tuesday! :wave:

I have a layover in Charlotte, North Carolina where there's a mechanical bull

Hi devs, tomorrow I have got an exam in UC3M (Madrid), it's going to be difficult, there are like 32 units ordered in 5 differents groups, there are two phases if the first one is passed,75 questions aprox, there is another stage. If all goes well it could be useful for opting in to work as a university employee. Wish me best of luck please :fingers_crossed:

Pablo Picurelli Ortiz said:

Hi devs, tomorrow I have got an exam in UC3M (Madrid), it's going to be difficult, there are like 32 units ordered in 5 differents groups, there are two phases if the first one is passed,75 questions aprox, there is another stage. If all goes well it could be useful for opting in to work as a university employee. Wish me best of luck please :fingers_crossed:

It's my first time doing this so I don't know if it could happen, if both people have the same points, usually to measure who passes it's done in merits, I have prepared both of my certs in cyber security HTB CPTS and CBBH, apart from DSpace CVE from this summer
@Pablo Picurelli Ortiz good luck!
Have a good weekend, everyone!
